class_notes: This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and  time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course will use the text of the Tale of Genji as a centerpoint from which to explore various issues in poetry, aesthetics, the visual arts, religion, history, politics, and gender in Japanese cultural history.
